text: Trinità d'Agultu e Vignola (La Trinitàie Vignòla) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 2,245 people lived there. Its area is 134 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 365 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Trinità d'Agultu e Vignola
